thread.title: Summer Sale: magazine subscriptions from just £1
thread.title_full: Summer Sale: magazine subscriptions from just £1 - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Summer Sale: magazine subscriptions from just £1
text: Whether you enjoy gardening, cooking, cycling, have a love for craft or need inspiration for your next holiday, you're sure to find the magazine for you. Great reasons to subscribe: - Subscriptions from just £1* - Save up to 41% after your trial period - Easy and convenient delivery direct to your door - Perfect summer reading There’s no obligation and you’re free to cancel at any time. How to Claim To subscibe and find out more, click here. * These offers are available for UK delivery addresses by Direct Debit only. Offer end 31st August 2015. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
